      • getDestinationAddressPrefix

        public String getDestinationAddressPrefix()
        Required. Gets or sets destination address prefix. CIDR or source IP range. Asterix “*” can also be used to match all source IPs. Default tags such as ‘VirtualNetwork’, ‘AzureLoadBalancer’ and ‘Internet’ can also be used.
        Returns:
        The DestinationAddressPrefix value.

      • setDestinationAddressPrefix

        Parameters:
        destinationAddressPrefixValue - The DestinationAddressPrefix value.

      • getDestinationPortRange

        public String getDestinationPortRange()
        Optional. Gets or sets Destination Port or Range. Integer or range between 0 and 65535. Asterix “*” can also be used to match all ports.
        Returns:
        The DestinationPortRange value.

      • getDirection

        public String getDirection()
        Required. Gets or sets the direction of the rule.InBound or Outbound. The direction specifies if rule will be evaluated on incoming or outcoming traffic.
        Returns:
        The Direction value.

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection(String directionValue)
        Required. Gets or sets the direction of the rule.InBound or Outbound. The direction specifies if rule will be evaluated on incoming or outcoming traffic.
        Parameters:
        directionValue - The Direction value.

      • getPriority

        public int getPriority()
        Optional. Gets or sets the priority of the rule. The value can be between 100 and 4096. The priority number must be unique for each rule in the collection. The lower the priority number, the higher the priority of the rule.
        Returns:
        The Priority value.

      • setPriority

        public void setPriority(int priorityValue)
        Optional. Gets or sets the priority of the rule. The value can be between 100 and 4096. The priority number must be unique for each rule in the collection. The lower the priority number, the higher the priority of the rule.
        Parameters:
        priorityValue - The Priority value.

      • getProtocol

        public String getProtocol()
        Required. Gets or sets Network protocol this rule applies to. Can be Tcp, Udp or All(*).
        Returns:
        The Protocol value.

      • getSourceAddressPrefix

        public String getSourceAddressPrefix()
        Required. Gets or sets source address prefix. CIDR or source IP range. Asterix “*” can also be used to match all source IPs. Default tags such as ‘VirtualNetwork’, ‘AzureLoadBalancer’ and ‘Internet’ can also be used. If this is an ingress rule, specifies where network traffic originates from.
        Returns:
        The SourceAddressPrefix value.

      • setSourceAddressPrefix

        public void setSourceAddressPrefix(String sourceAddressPrefixValue)
        Required. Gets or sets source address prefix. CIDR or source IP range. Asterix “*” can also be used to match all source IPs. Default tags such as ‘VirtualNetwork’, ‘AzureLoadBalancer’ and ‘Internet’ can also be used. If this is an ingress rule, specifies where network traffic originates from.
        Parameters:
        sourceAddressPrefixValue - The SourceAddressPrefix value.
